title: Castles and country: a view of Scotland
creator_credit: Shirley Cobham, National Benzole and Random Films
brief_description: Illustrates the work of the National Trust for Scotland in preserving castles, palaces, historical sites such as Glencoe, Iona, and the gardens of Crarae, Ardkinglass and Inverewe. Each sequence beings with a close-up, then opens out to a general view enabling appreciation of the architectural line or scene.
